title: G510 How do I use USB tethering if I connect my phone to a computer running Windows Vista or Windows 7?
answer:
Use a USB cable to connect your phone to the computer. The computer automatically installs
the driver for your phone.
Connect your phone (with a SIM or USIM card installed) to the computer and touch
Settings > All > More > Tethering & portable hotspot and select USB tethering.
